next_actions: Develop manuscript-ready visuals/figures for the H1 confirmatory contrasts (interaction plots + public tables) while keeping every disclosed cell at n>=10.
Prototype partial proportional-odds or multinomial net-worth models to address the H3 proportional-odds violations flagged in loop008.
Scope the next robustness wave (e.g., H1 bootstrap CIs or alternative anxiety codings) before transitioning into the sensitivity phase.
